title: E-learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Universal Instructional Design (UID)-based Elementary Mathematics Online Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life problems (e.g., dividing cooking ingredients) using fraction concepts in VR simulation environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners submit assignments in various formats (video production, text report, or audio recording) and explain learning content in three or more ways.
Learners can provide meaningful feedback two or more times during peer collaboration to solve math problems in weekly peer review sessions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
